biography: An American actor and voice actor, perhaps best known as criminal psychologist Dr. Peter Silberman in The Terminator, Terminator 2: Judgment Day and Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines. He is the only actor besides Arnold Schwarzenegger to appear in each of the first three Terminator films. Wikipedia
name: Earl Boen
place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
